t: Lewis Metal Works, Inc. | Machining/Welding/Fabrication | Sheet Metal Work - Halifax County Chamber of Commerce, VA
s: In 1993, G.B. King and Lewis was renamed Lewis Metal Works, Inc. and moved to its new and present home in the J. Aubrey Houghton Industial Park. The business continued to expand and in 1999 Lewis opened a machine shop and millwright division in a leased building on U.S. Highway 58 East.
